Package schimkat.berlin.lernhilfe2024ws.graphics

package schimkat.berlin.lernhilfe2024ws.graphics
This package contains utility classes for easy painting.

    Drawable
    The interface Drawable provides access to the rendering service of FunnyFirstPainter.
    FunnyFirstPainter
    The class FunnyFirstPainter provides a GUI with a painting surface inside.
